textBeforeTable: MONTROSE Regional AIRPORT (MTJ) Airport Transportation Known as one of the most walker-friendly cities in the United States, you may not need motorized transportation once you are in Telluride. Most guests walk around town or use Telluride's free Gondola and shuttle services to move between Telluride and Mountain Village once they are here. textAfterTable: TELLURIDE REGIONAL AIRPORT (TEX) SERVICE PROVIDER PHONE NUMBER Airport Transfers/Shuttle Telluride Express (970) 728-6000 Airport Transfers/Shuttle Mountain Limo (970) 728-9606 Airport Transfers/Shuttle Alpine Luxury Limo (970) 728-8750 Car Rental Hertz (970) 240-8464 Local Transportation FREE GONDOLA Linking two towns, the gondola is the only transportation system of its kind in North America. Running daily from 7am to midnight, the 13-minute gondola ride eliminates the 20-minute, 8-mile drive between both towns. (The gondola operates year-round, with temporary off-season closures.) Click here for more information GALLOPING GOOSE The Galloping Goose bus service provides free transportation in and around the town of Telluride, Mountain Village and Lawson Hill. It also provides paid bus transportation to Norwood and Placerville. For more information about the Galloping Goose, call (970) 728-5700 DIAL-A-RIDE Dial-A-Ride offers free transportation for guests and residents in and around Mountain Village. For more information about Dial-A-Ride, call (970) 728-8888 Getting Here Flights Driving Directions Ground Transportation Parking Snow Report 24-hr: 0" | 3-Day: 0" | Base: 0" 63°
